tool_description: Generate beautiful screenshots with our website screenshot API
name: ScreenshotAPI.net
title: ScreenshotAPI.net

api_list.name: Screenshot
api_list.description: Take a screenshot of a website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshotapi-net.p.rapidapi.com/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshotapi-net.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshotapi-net.p.rapidapi.com/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshotapi-net.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
